text: Hi guys. A support employee redirected me here. I was wondering why the API call log does not record the body of the request/responses ("No body was recorded for this request."). Is there a setting some where to enable this (which I overlooked)? Without the payload of the calls it's not that useful to debug. Thanks in advance :slightly_smiling_face:
it will record the body if you get errors in the request

Hey everyone, I am looking to update an image, body text and CTA link of an automated drag + drop email in HubSpot via the "Update Marketing Email" API, but the log only shows the ability to update subject line, from name and a few other fields. Has anyone had success doing this?

My English is not as strong but I will still express myself. By the way, I would like to integrate HubSpot on an application developed with Angular and Spring boot.
I have read the documentation but I still can't do it. So I would like to have some solutions to this. thank you in advance
Hope you found some help with the french community!
